```{r}
df <- read.csv('data/baseball_data.csv')

df$HR_normalized = (df$HR - min(df$HR))/(max(df$HR) - min(df$HR))
df$avg_normalized = (df$avg - min(df$avg))/(max(df$avg) - min(df$avg))
```
